title: Re-enchantment, Beauty & the Death of the Secular Age | Paul Anleitner on THE VAST podcast
description:
I recently wrote an article for Ekstasis Magazine entitled "The God We Thought Was Dead" and the guys over at THE VAST podcast wanted to have a discussion about some of the themes present in that article including re-enchantment, beauty, and the death of the Secular Age.

You can check out The Vast podcast at:
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-vast-podcast/id1558428782

You can read my article for Ekstasis magazine at:
https://www.ekstasismagazine.com/blog/2022/2/16/the-god-we-thought-was-dead

To support this channel and the Deep Talks podcast:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast
